data.title: Election Calendar
data.meta_description: The Election calendar houses details on upcoming elections on the African continent.
data.text:
Welcome to EISA’s African Elections Calendar. The calendar houses details on upcoming elections on the continent as well as historical information on elections held since the calendar’s creation in 2005.

Information at Your Fingertips.

Election Calendar

Welcome to EISA’s African Elections Calendar. The calendar houses details on upcoming elections on the continent as well as historical information on elections held since the calendar’s creation in 2005.
